title: 42  Raisa G. Matveeva, Fragment (Depicting Airplanes), 1929
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">42  
Designed by Raisa G. Matveeva (Russian, born 1906)  
Manufactured by Great Ivanovo-Voznesensk Textile Mill (Russia)  
Fragment (Depicting Airplanes)  
1927  
Cotton, plain weave; probably screen-printed; 7.8 × 13.8 cm (3 1/8 × 5 1/2 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.42

</section><section id="figures">Raisa G. Matveeva, Fragment (Depicting Airplanes), 1929.

</section>
